io.confluent.ksql.rest.server

Class TestKsqlRestAppWaitingOnPrecondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.rules.ExternalResource
      • io.confluent.ksql.rest.server.TestKsqlRestApp
        • io.confluent.ksql.rest.server.TestKsqlRestAppWaitingOnPrecondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.rules.TestRule

    public class TestKsqlRestAppWaitingOnPrecondition
extends TestKsqlRestApp
    A TestKsqlRestApp for testing behavior of a server stuck waiting on a precondition. The server is not started automatically. Rather, startAndWaitForPrecondition() should be called by the test suite. A CountDownLatch provided in the constructor counts down when a precondition check is called, in order to finish configuring the app once the server is waiting for preconditions.
